item.title: I-10 East - Exit 22A
item.description: I-10 East at Exit 22A - TX-478 Loop/Copia St. For the Chamizal Coliseum use Exit 22B (I-110).

item.title: I-10 East - Exits 22A and 22B
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 22A - TX-478 Loop/Copia St. Approaching Exit 22B - US-54/Alamogordo (NM)/Fort Bliss/Juarez (Mexico). Continue east on I-10 for San Antonio and Van Horn.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 23A and 22B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 23A - Raynolds St. Approaching Exit 22B - US-54/Patriot Freeway/Alamogordo/Fort Bliss/Ju√°rez (Mexico). Also approaching Copia St., and Piedras St./Cotton St interchanges.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 22A
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 22A - TX-478 Loop/Copia St.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 22A
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 22A - TX-478 Loop/Copia St. Approaching Piedras St., Cotton St., and Downtown interchanges.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 23A and 22B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 23A - Raynolds St. Approaching Exit 22B - US-54/Patriot Freeway/Alamogordo (NM)/Fort Bliss/Juarez (Mexico). Continue west on I-10 for Copia St./TX 478 Loop/Piedras St./Cotton St.
